verbose_text: The interactions of PM 2.5 with Phi6 bacteriophages decreased viral infectivity compared to treatment with HEPA2 filtered air alone; By contrast, PhiX174, a non enveloped virus, displayed increased infectivity when treated with PM 2.5 particles relative to controls treated only with HEPA filtered air.
evidence: PM 2.5  with Phi6 bacteriophages decreased viral infectivity compared to treatment with HEPA2-filtered air
